text: Ernest Martin (born 1878, date of death unknown) was a French swimmer. He competed in the men's 4000 metre freestyle event and the water polo at the 1900 Summer Olympics. ==References== Category:1878 births Category:Year of death missing Category:French male swimmers Category:French male water polo players Category:Olympic swimmers of France Category:Olympic water polo players of France Category:Swimmers at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Water polo players at the 1900 Summer Olympics Category:Place of birth missing
title: Ernest Martin (swimmer)
